page.title: 09THE RECTOR OF HOLT.
page.content: THE RECTOR OF HOLT DECIDED TO BECOME A PRIEST BECAUSE HE FELT THAT GOD WANTED HIM TO, AND HE FELT HE COULD HELP PEOPLE. HE WORKS VERY LONG HOURS. EVERY DAY MANY PEOPLE COME TO SEE HIM AND SOMETIMES HE GOES TO SEE THEM. HE ENJOYS HIS WORK VERY MUCH AND HE TOLD US THAT HIS HOBBIES WERE READING, GARDENING, AND SWIMMING. THE RECTOR SAID THAT{LOOKING AFTER FOUR {CHURCHES}INVOLVES A GREAT DEAL OF TRAVELLING, HE ALSO SAID THAT HE DOES LOTS OF SHORT JOURNEYS, AND HE DOES APPROXIMATELY{250 MILES A WEEK.}THE RECTOR SAID THAT HE HAD BEEN RECTOR OF HOLT SINCE{1974.}HE SAID THAT HE WAS VERY FORGETFUL AND NEARLY EVERY DAY HE MISLAID THE CHURCH KEY. ONE DAY HE FORGOT A CHRISTENING. HE HAS TO ATTEND LOTS OF MEETINGS EACH WEEK. HE HAS 4 CHILDREN AND LOTS OF PETS.
